english.segment1: This is the place I've known. Here in the arms of one who loves. Deeper than anyone. His are the hands I've grown to trust
english.segment2: And this is the place I've known. Here in the arms of one who loves. Farther than I could run. His are the hands I've grown to trust. And I believe..
english.segment3: His are the hands that spread the sky. And His is the love that gives me life. And His are the broken, the needy ones. And He is the love
